title: Buckle Your Shoes
description: Heathstead, an assistant deacon who sleeps with the constable’s daughter, is forced to hide out as a lady shoe salesman at Kevinson’s Cobblery. Includes the long-awaited Holiday Special.
quote: Beatrix, can I fetch you a pair of wellies?
altHero: Heathstead wearing his signature yellow jacket and bowler cap
alt2: a snowy signpost in front of Big Ben
alt4: Heathstead and Beatrix stand outside the cobblery looking away from each other
